original_text: When those tending the pigs saw what had happened, they ran off and reported this in the town and countryside,
korean_text: 치던 자들이 그 이루어진 일을 보고 도망하여 성내와 마을에 알리니

sentences.original_text: When those tending the pigs saw what had happened,
sentences.korean_translation: 돼지를 치던 자들이 무슨 일이 일어났는지 보았을 때,

sentences.original_text: and reported this in the town
